dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3715543F] Copyright Act Infringement Demand
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Sunday, April 01, 2007 12:42 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3715543F] Copyright Act Infringement Demand ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Act Infringement Demand Added by system at Sunday, Apr 1 2007 05:36 pm X-MailFrom: mike@myhelphub.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sun Apr 1 17:36:51 2007 Received: (qmail 25114 invoked by alias); 1 Apr 2007 22:36:51 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 25111 invoked from network); 1 Apr 2007 22:36:51 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 1 Apr 2007 22:36:51 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sun, 1 Apr 2007 17:36:51 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sun, 01 Apr 2007 17:36:51 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from mike@myhelphub.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HY8fK-0002ka-Id; Sun, 01 Apr 2007 17:36:50 -0500 Received: from mail.myhelphub.com ([206.196.28.170]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from mike@myhelphub.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HY8fJ-000O40-9i; Sun, 01 Apr 2007 17:36:49 -0500 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=----_SmarterMail_NextPart_1542136488121375 Date: Sun, 1 Apr 2007 18:36:27 -0400 Received: from [71.76.129.46] by mail.myhelphub.com via HTTP; Sun, 1 Apr 2007 18:36:27 -0400 Subject: Copyright Act Infringement Demand From: "Mike" Reply-To: mike@myhelphub.com To: CC: Message-ID: <70b6f8489bdf470d840b35221256b633@myhelphub.com> Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of myhelphub.com designates 206.196.28.170 as permitted sender) client-ip=206.196.28.170; envelope-from=mike@myhelphub.com; helo=mail.myhelphub.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 01 Apr 2007 22:36:51.0247 (UTC) FILETIME=[3DBFF3F0:01C774AE] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. TPCM 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 74.52.131.146 Sirs: OFFICIAL DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT INFRINGEMENT DEMAND This letter demands that you immediately cease and desist the use of copyrighted materials, currently hosted by your company, specifically: http://www.alldvdcodes.com/ I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that the information provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge. This letter is an official notification under provisions of section 512(c) of the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringement listed in this location, which infringes on copyrighted contented currently hosted online at: http://www.dvdunlocker.com/ The above site and all related material is wholly owned and copyrighted by my client, White Cliff Computing Ltd (http://www.whitecliff.net/). As a miscellany, you can actually verify that the theft has taken place yourself: If you visit http://www.alldvdcodes.com/ you will note that the individual has still left our original website images and signup Javascript code inside the stolen pages. We hereby request that you immediately remove or block access to the infringing material, as specified by the DMCA, and insure the user refrains from using or sharing such materials in the future. You are required under law to provide a prompt response to this request. If I do not hear from you within 7 days, this action will be referred for further legal action. Regards, Michael Sheffield Legal Counsel to White Cliff Computing Ltd http://www.whitecliff.net/ Michael J. Sheffield Legal Counsel, WCCL Network E-mail: mike@myhelphub.com Web: www.wcclnetwork.com ---------------------------------------- THIS E-MAIL MAY CONTAIN INFORMATION THAT IS CONFIDENTIAL AND/OR LEGALLY PRIVILEGED. IF YOU ARE NOT THE INTENDED RECIPIENT, PLEASE DO NOT READ IT, DELETE IT IMMEDIATELY AND INFORM WHITE CLIFF COMPUTING LTD MIME element (text/html)

ThePlanet.com
